oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic baby food: quality and product range requirements
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Seidel, Kathrin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Processing, packaging and transportation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Based on a study of consumers and processors within the EU project Core Organic QACCP the discussion addresses what kind of product range and quality is required for organic baby food.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Seidel, Kathrin (2008) Organic baby food: quality and product range requirements. Paper at: BioFach Congress 2008, Nuremberg, Germany, February 21-24, 2008. [Unpublished]
